title: [Large-Scale] Technology Integration Instructional Design Strategies for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogy theories and science subject matter expertise
context.additional_context: A professional development program for in-service teachers aimed at enhancing their competency in designing effective technology-integrated science lessons. Conducted through practice-based learning in environments with digital device support.

learning_goals: They can diagnose the application level of six technology integration strategies (role modeling, reflection, collaboration, feedback, lesson design, authentic experiences) using the SQD assessment tool.
They can develop technology-enhanced lesson designs tailored to science curricula based on four core elements: objectives, methods, assessment, and resources.
They can improve instructional execution strategies in three stages (drafting, revision, validation) by combining peer feedback and digital tool analysis.

resources: Digital Content Platform for Science Education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
